// src/auth/auth0-provider-with-history.js
import React from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{Auth0Provider}from"@auth0/auth0-react";var Auth0ProviderWithHistory=({children})=>{var history=useHistory();var domain=process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH0_DOMAIN;var clientId=process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH0_CLIENT_ID;var audience=process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH0_AUDIENCE;var onRedirectCallback=appState=>{history.push((appState===null||appState===void 0?void 0:appState.returnTo)||window.location.pathname);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Auth0Provider,{domain:domain,clientId:clientId,redirectUri:window.location.origin,onRedirectCallback:onRedirectCallback,audience:audience},children);};export default Auth0ProviderWithHistory;
